artist: Engraver: Jacques Philippe Le Bas; Artist: After Jean-Baptiste Oudry
description: park; black openwork fence at left with arched entrance; stairs center; seated man and woman; standing man next to them; man mounting unseen stairs; two small dogs center front on path; a couple and a group of people near top of stairs
inscription:
Title, Date, and Inscription

below image in black: [d\'Apres JB Oudry sous la Direction du JP LeBas 1776/ Ancienne et premier Vue d\'Arceuil/ à Paris chés l\'Auteur rue de la Harpe/ 1-87(in pencil)]
title: Ancienne et premiere Vue d'Arceuil
